campaigns.name: Baseline Strength & Dumbbell Fluency
campaigns.goal: Build foundational strength and master dumbbell movement patterns across all major muscle groups
campaigns.strategy: 5-day full body split with push/pull/legs emphasis rotation. Progressive overload via weight or reps when form permits. Deload week 5.
campaigns.notes: Weeks 1-2: Focus on form, use conservative weights. Weeks 3-4: Begin adding load. Week 5: Deload (reduced volume). Weeks 6-8: Push intensity.
